title: XML for the new world event schedules

comments.author: Teranas.6150
comments.body:
I’ve done the same in JSON format with some additional information. Activation times are provided in UTC.

The timer-field will hold the in-game timer for the specific event (so this file is work in progress).

comments.author: iPHAnTom.6280
comments.body:
I basically took the data given on the new blogpost and put it into an XML file. Useful for people who are going to make or update their projects to work with the new times.
Hope this can help a lot of people.

PS. There might be some mistakes in the file, but I don’t think there are. Please reply if you can find some wrong information.

Sincerely Desire (iPHAnTom.6280)
